content: **knitted mittens for men in drops karisma piece is knitted from finger-tips to cuff with nordic pattern ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ #forestfrostmittens drops design pattern u-992 yarn group b ---------------------------------------------------------- **size** s/m l/xl measurements circumference approx 21-23 cm length approx 26-28 cm **yarn** drops karisma from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 100-100 g colour 87 moss green 50-50 g colour 85 light beige **needles** drops double pointed needles size 3 mm **knitting gauge** 23 stitches in width and 32 row vertically in stocking stitch and nordic pattern on needle size 3 mm = 10 x 10 cm remember needle size is only a suggestion if you have too many stitches on 10 cm switch to larger sized needles or if you get too few stitches on 10 cm switch to smaller sized needles
